text: Majid Molania (born 1980) is an Iranian traditional music composer. He is a winner of Barbad Award for Best Iranian Music Composer of the Year for the album Shall Live in Love. ==Works== * Dowran-e Eshgh * Cheshm Bikhab * Shall Live in Love ==References== Category:Iranian actors Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian composers
title: Majid Mowlania
